title: Comfortable Cedar Park studio
description:
Comfortable 300 square foot studio with a separate kitchen/living area and bedroom. Unit is the 3rd floor rear and is only accessible by staircase. There are two closets for storage, and I’ve found the the overall space is fairly adaptable for different uses. Trash and water are covered by landlord, gas and electric are not included and average out to around $90/month. The apartment is wired for FiOS. Cats and at least small dogs are permitted - a single cat does not incur an increase in rent, terms for an additional cat or for a dog would need to be run by the landlord. No washer/dryer provided, but there are several laundromats nearby.
You would be taking over 11 months of my current lease with the option to start your own lease in July 2023. The landlord’s rental application is required for move-in ($40 fee). 2 months’ rent required for security deposit at time of lease signing plus first month’s rent at move-in.

title: 319 Meetinghouse Lane in Media Borough
description: This spacious 3 bedroom 2 bath Ranch home sits on a half-acre lot & ready for you to make it your own. Front entrance opens into a sunlit living room with large bay windows & wood-burning, stone fireplace, coat closet, an updated kitchen, electric cooking, newer white-wood cabinetry, quartz counters, deep stainless sink & tile floor. Kitchen open to the dining area, overlooking rear yard & side patio with outside access to garage. The primary bedroom has 3 windows, double closets, & an updated stall shower bath. Two (2) additional good size bedrooms with amble closets, hall linen closet & an updated full hall-bath. Ceiling fans & blinds in all bedrooms. Lower Level is partially-finished, used as a family room, the Egress window installed (2015) allows for plenty of daylight). The storage/utility room includes the laundry area, mechanicals, Central Air System (2015) & additional storage space. Enjoy summer entertaining outside in the deep, level rear- yard, accessible from the kitchen & attached 1-car garage. First floor hardwood floors throughout (except kitchen & baths), Replacement windows, Pull-down attic access for additional storage with a newer ventilation fan. description:
3108 Clifford St #1 – Luxury 3 bed 3 bath home with parking space!
Gorgeous luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt in Brewerytown area, just a block from Fairmount Park is the perfect place to create new memories! This brand new first and sub level unit atop wonderful hardwood flooring is a one half of a 2 unit modern architectural space, curated with an eclectic mixture of contemporary fixtures amidst a ton of amenities for a higher quality of living. Now imagine you live here! The perfect spot to explore the city on foot, bicycle, or however, you choose.
The first bedroom (10’7″ x 9’6″) sits at the front part of the main level and while big windows are obvious at first sight, ample closet space are one of its best assets! A full bathroom with a stand up shower also sits on the main level. Discover an extravagant kitchen with quartz countertops, sleek white cabinetry, a breakfast bar and stainless-steel appliances including: a refrigerator, microwave, gas stove, dishwasher–which create an ideal setting for meal preparation. The kitchen and living room area make up a bright and open concept floorplan and just off the living room a back entrance/exit which leads out to the driveway wherein your own parking space exists to relieve the parking woes we the citizens of Philadelphia have had bestowed upon us.
The sublevel includes 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom with an ensuite bathroom) located on opposite ends, closet space, a slate tiled bathroom with a large stand up shower, a stacked washer/dryer atop hardwood flooring. 2nd bedroom (12’4”x11’8”) located on the front part of the sublevel, includes closet space. 3rd bedroom (12’3”x12’4”) located in the rear of the sublevel as an ensuite bathroom with a tiled stand up shower, as well as, tons of sunlight.

The second floor has a very large bedroom with a full bathroom and a large walk in storage closet with shelves and a second large hanging closet with an additional hanging and storage area.  A separate second floor laundry room has a washer and dryer and additional storage space and cabinets.

title: This immaculate 1-bedroom, 1-bath home with enclosed garage parking
description: This immaculate 1-bedroom, 1-bath home with enclosed garage parking is located in Naval Square, Philadelphia’s premier gated community! Setting it apart from the rest, you will enjoy many significant upgrades in both esthetics and convenience, including upscale designer light fixtures in the dining room, hallway, and bathroom.  Custom painted walls throughout, as well as upgraded kitchen and bathroom faucets. The modern kitchen features a breakfast bar with sleek granite countertops, Whirlpool stainless appliance suite, tiled backsplash, and 42” natural cherry cabinetry with ample storage. The tranquil, open concept living/ dining space offers high ceilings, crown moldings, recessed LED lighting & gleaming hardwood floors. A Juliet balcony with French sliding doors provides an abundance of natural light. The spacious owner’s suite has two gorgeous windows that allows the sunlight to stream in! Luxurious hall bath features an updated lighting fixture, granite vanity, subway tile shower with a marble shelf, and brand-new shower fixtures. Just off the hall, is a separate linen closet with a full-size, side-by-side washer/dryer as well as a substantial coat closet. Save energy and money with a new hot water heater (2020). The deeded indoor parking spot (#9) and your very own storage unit (3x6x9) are located just steps from the elevator! Featuring almost 1,000 SF, this perfectly maintained home is uniquely located in the Pemberton building- the only building within the community allowing for direct access to a state-of-the-art fitness center and seasonal outdoor pool. The dramatic community room in Biddle Hall rotunda is perfect to reserve for private parties. Enjoy wonderful outdoor amenities- including picnic areas, well-kept gardens & mature landscaping. Naval Square is a pet-friendly, tranquil 20-acre park-like setting, with a concierge, on-site security, on-site management, and gorgeous common spaces. Easy freeway access and close proximity to South Street Bridge, UPenn, CHOP, HUP & Drexel, Rittenhouse & Fitler Sq's! Exceptional location for graduate students, faculty, and residents. Exciting restaurants, shops and cafes, including the brand new Heirloom Market by Giant are all just steps outside the gates. Directly out the back gate you can enjoy the Schuylkill River Park, including the Award Winning Trail & Boardwalk, Markward playground, Tennis Courts & dog park!

title: $1,400 large one-bedroom overlooking Clark Park - August 1st
description:
Hi All,
We have a large and light filled, one-bedroom apartment overlooking Clark Park, available for rent August 1st.
The apartment is going to be fully renovated in the month of July to be ready for an August 1st occupancy, so we do not have photos at this time, although I am happy to give a tour at your convenience.
The apartment is South facing with a ton of windows. It is on the 3rd floor of a grand old mansion at 44th and Baltimore an the building has a washer and dryer in the basement. There is a large bedroom and a giant living room/kitchen, which is open and connected. There is also a hallway and bathroom. Hardwood floors, ceiling fans and in-unit, heating and cooling via mini-splits.
The location is tremendous, with a view of Clark Park, close proximity to the 34 trolley, and an easy stroll to restaurants, coffeeshops, and Baltimore Avenue shopping.
Landlord pays for water, tenant pays for electric and cooking gas.
Available August 1st - 1st, last, and security to move in.
Thanks!
Milan

title: Unbeatable location right between everything Rittenhouse and Graduate
description: Unbeatable location right between everything Rittenhouse and Graduate Hospital have to offer, this spacious, cheerful, and charming 1 BR/1.5 ba condo offers a quiet respite from the city, with unique features including a huge private basement that doubles your space for storage, office, workshop, gym, or whatever you'd like to create. Vestibule opens to an open plan living area with hardwood floors, high ceilings, crown molding, built ins, space for a dining table, and even a gas fireplace for chilly days and nights. The open kitchen with island seating features a gas range, granite counters, stainless appliances, and a window over the sink to let the sunlight in. There's even a powder room for guests as well. The master bedroom has double closets with storage above, and a private en suite bath with tub and shower. Off the bedroom, you'll find a small and lovely private patio for your morning coffee or drinks to unwind after a long day. The private basement is nearly as large as the unit itself, and includes front loading washer/dryer & Bilco door to the street to bring in any large items or bicycles, etc. Low condo fees and incredible location make this a smart buy. Short walk to Rittenhouse Square, Schuylkill Trail, and U City/Penn/CHOP. Everything you could imagine is right outside your door: boutiques, coffee, farmers markets, gym, groceries, restaurants are all within steps. Greenfield catchment.

title: 3 bedroom / 1 bathroom single family home available for Rent
description: Available Early August ; Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history. Welcome to 3553 Jasper St! This 3 bedroom / 1 bathroom single family home greets you with a nice front porch, hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, ceiling fans, and gorgeous modern finishes throughout. Enter into the spacious living and dining area with a large window at the front for sunlight. A ceiling fan provides year-round comfort and the hardwood floors stretch back to your eat-in kitchen. There are white shaker cabinets, ample prep space, and black & white subway tile backsplash, along with a full lineup of appliances including microwave, gas stove, fridge, and dishwasher. A small back patio is off the kitchen - perfect for enjoying the warmer months. Continue upstairs to view your 3 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. The largest room is to the front with a beautiful bay window, ceiling fan, and good closet space. Your medium size bedroom is in the middle with a closet and window, and another room is to the back with a window for sunlight. Head into your stunning bathroom featuring a lighted vanity, window, and black & white tiled bathtub / shower combo. Your in-unit laundry is in the unfinished basement along with additional storage space. Call for a tour today! title: Beautiful One Bedroom , Beautiful Court Yards
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
